results.content:
Thrandur explained everything what was expected but at the same time he has inspired me to learn more! You don't need to know PHP to master this course but you will definitely want to get familiar with PHP because it makes all the magic with customization of Wordpress. 
I highly recomend this course and Thrandur as an instructor. He is really cool! :)

results.content: With not having a clue how to even start developing a custom theme, this course is straight to the point and easy to follow. My only wish was that the author included his Wordpress content to download where he was teaching from later on in the course. Starting around Lecture 21, to be specific. In order for me to follow along I had to figure out how to create the sections he was teaching from, but I think that also helped me better understand what he was trying to show. But other than that, he was easy to understand and follow along. Great course. :) I now feel very confident that I can start creating and developing custom themed Wordpress websites.

Cameron.

results.content:
This course covers the basics of creating a WordPress theme and integrating Bootstrap3 with it.
You also get some nice hints on css, using the WP API and bootstrap.
I wish there were a bit more content when it comes to bootstrap but I guess I will have to read up on it myself.

It helps to have some experience with the WP api, css and php.
results.content_html:
This course covers the basics of creating a WordPress theme and integrating Bootstrap3 with it.
You also get some nice hints on css, using the WP API and bootstrap.
I wish there were a bit more content when it comes to bootstrap but I guess I will have to read up on it myself.

It helps to have some experience with the WP api, css and php.

results.content: Content is good but professor goes on at times without explaining what a certain piece of code is responsible for.It is a basic course for converting a static Bootstrap HTML site into a Wordpress theme.
results.content_html: Content is good but professor goes on at times without explaining what a certain piece of code is responsible for.It is a basic course for converting a static Bootstrap HTML site into a Wordpress theme.

results.content:
For years, I would usually hack a Wordpress theme in order to customize it, but it would take me hours, because I'd have to figure out the PHP and Javascript.  My background is Web-Graphic Designer, although I am able to figure out code to a certain extent (but not to the extent of a seasoned professional coder and developer.)  I've made the decision to get more skills and also upgrade what I know.

Also, I just got into Twitter Bootstrap this year and although I've taken courses recently, I really love it, I know that eventually I have to start applying all my projects to a CMS (Drupal and Wordpress.)

Since I develop for both Drupal and Wordpress, I figured that I would start with Wordpress, to get an idea how things work from a CMS point of view.

This course exceeded my expectations.  The instructor helped make sense of many things from the Wordpress and PHP to Bootstrap point of view.  Everything for the index.php to the header.php and footer.php, plus the sidebar.php and category.php sections - and how to take your Bootstrap webpage Prototype in to the Wordpress and PHP domain, the majority of it made sense.

I will have to re-review some sections as repetition is the mother of skill, but I honestly and very happy and more that satisfied.  I am so glad I enrolled into this course and it has helped me gain confidence in developing my own Wordpress (and CMS) themes paired with the Bootstrap Framework. 

I can use what I've learned not only for my work (I'll have to figure out the Drupal version of applying Bootstrap to it), but also for freelance work and developing Wordpress themes for selling on online marketplaces.  This course has helped make that a reality and I know I will reach my goals because of this course.

Thank you so much Thrandur and I look forward to learning more from your courses.

response.content:
I was extremely happy to see your inspired web development project Rodney!
Way to go :)
response.content_html:
I was extremely happy to see your inspired web development project Rodney!
Way to go :)

results.content_html:
For years, I would usually hack a Wordpress theme in order to customize it, but it would take me hours, because I'd have to figure out the PHP and Javascript. My background is Web-Graphic Designer, although I am able to figure out code to a certain extent (but not to the extent of a seasoned professional coder and developer.) I've made the decision to get more skills and also upgrade what I know.

Also, I just got into Twitter Bootstrap this year and although I've taken courses recently, I really love it, I know that eventually I have to start applying all my projects to a CMS (Drupal and Wordpress.)

Since I develop for both Drupal and Wordpress, I figured that I would start with Wordpress, to get an idea how things work from a CMS point of view.

This course exceeded my expectations. The instructor helped make sense of many things from the Wordpress and PHP to Bootstrap point of view. Everything for the index.php to the header.php and footer.php, plus the sidebar.php and category.php sections - and how to take your Bootstrap webpage Prototype in to the Wordpress and PHP domain, the majority of it made sense.

I will have to re-review some sections as repetition is the mother of skill, but I honestly and very happy and more that satisfied. I am so glad I enrolled into this course and it has helped me gain confidence in developing my own Wordpress (and CMS) themes paired with the Bootstrap Framework.

I can use what I've learned not only for my work (I'll have to figure out the Drupal version of applying Bootstrap to it), but also for freelance work and developing Wordpress themes for selling on online marketplaces. This course has helped make that a reality and I know I will reach my goals because of this course.

Thank you so much Thrandur and I look forward to learning more from your courses.

results.content:
I really dig this course even though it appears to be in its infancy because this is the first course that I have found that integrates the Bootstrap Framework with WordPress.

This course is great especially for beginners and intermediate users with some knowledge of creating a WordPress Child Theme.

I look forward to seeing what the instructors comes up with next to add more value to this training course.  Good start Thrandur!  Keep the lectures coming!

- JJ
